Jx.Panel.DataView

Extends: Jx.Panel

This panel extension takes a standard Jx.Store (or subclass) and displays each record as an item using a provided template.  It sorts the store as requested before doing so.  The class only creates the HTML and has no default CSS display.  All styling must be done by the developer using the control.

Events

renderDonefires when the panel completes creating all of the items.

Summary
Jx.Panel.DataViewExtends: Jx.Panel
Options
dataThe store containing the data
sortColumnsAn array of columns to sort the store by.
itemTemplateThe template to use in rendering records
emptyTemplatethe template that is displayed when there are no records in the store.
containerClassThe class added to the container.
itemClassThe class to add to each item.
itemOptionsOptions to pass to the list object
Functions
renderRenders the dataview.
updateThis method begins the process of creating the items.

Options

data

The store containing the data

sortColumns

An array of columns to sort the store by.

itemTemplate

The template to use in rendering records

emptyTemplate

the template that is displayed when there are no records in the store.

containerClass

The class added to the container.  It can be used to target the items in the panel.

itemClass

The class to add to each item.  Used for styling purposes

itemOptions

Options to pass to the list object

Functions

render

render: function ()

Renders the dataview.  If the store already has data loaded it will be rendered at the end of the method.

update

update: function ()

This method begins the process of creating the items.  It is called when the store is loaded or can be called to manually recreate the view.

Extends: Jx.Widget
render: function ()
Renders the dataview.
update: function ()
This method begins the process of creating the items.
